DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study design predictive model stroke recovery base baseline measurement arm movement brain physiology . The expectation development formula predict person 's response arm rehabilitation program provide chronic phase ( 6 month great post stroke ) recovery . The study include magnetic resonance imaging ( MRI ) , transcranial magnetic stimulation ( TMS ) , genetic test use saliva , arm exercise program consist robot-assisted exercise combine functional arm exercise call transition task training ( TTT ) .
DOC.brief_title: Neurophysiological Kinematic Predictors Response Chronic Stroke
DOC.detailed_description: After informed consent , baseline neurological exam , MRI brain , TMS , questionnaires , cognitive testing , robot evaluation , arm function test occur . Baseline test occur first 4-6 week participation include three separate session approximately 1 week part examine arm strength , range motion , ability perform functional task . Additionally , one robot evaluation , one MRI two TMS session complete . We also collect genetic data use saliva sample examine potential genetic polymorphism might influence response therapy . The intervention phase consist 12 week robot arm exercise training ( TTT ) . Interventions occur 3 time per week 12 week total 36 visit . Additional time visit allow visit occur 4 time per week 4 additional week ( exceed 16 week ) schedule conflict arise . The intervention sessions one hour duration . During hour long intervention , 45 minute robotic intervention follow 15 minute TTT . Two separate robot target different movement use 3 phase robot training . The training sequential 12 session complete wrist robot , follow 12 session shoulder-elbow robot final 12 session alternate wrist elbow-shoulder robot .
DOC.criteria: Clinically define , unilateral , hemiparetic stroke radiologic exclusion possible diagnosis Stroke onset least 6 month enrollment Present Mild/Moderate Severe arm dysfunction ( base FuglMeyer score 10 45 ) Be medically stable participate study contractures impairment would interfere interventional training . Unable give inform consent Have serious complicate medical illness would preclude participation . Contractures orthopedic problem limit range joint motion potential study arm Visual loss subject would able see test pattern robot computer monitor Botulinum toxin study arm within four month study enrollment receive study period Unable comply requirement study Participants history seizure preclude study , enrol TMS portion Participants electromagnetic exclusion ( metal implant cranium , implant electronic device etc . ) preclude study exclude MRI TMS portion
